content: I'll definitely check out Headspace and Calm, as I've heard good things about them. I've already been using the Calm app to listen to guided meditation sessions, and it's been helpful. I'll also look into Insight Timer and Buddhify to see which one I like better. I think I'll start with short sessions, maybe 5-10 minutes, and see how it goes. Do you have any suggestions for some good books on mindfulness and self-care that I could read?
